title: India's Modi will meet with Putin on 2-day visit to Russia starting Monday, Kremlin says
description: The Kremlin on Thursday said Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi will visit Russia next Monday and Tuesday and hold talks with Russian President Vladimir Putin. The visit was first announced by Russian officials last month, but the dates have not been previously disclosed.

title: Pope Francis' chief of staff testifies in trial, admits to false invoice and blames a deputy
